Interface ExportNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
CompletedTaskRec, InProgressTaskRec, ToDoTaskRec
public sealed interface ExportNode permits ToDoTaskRec, InProgressTaskRec, CompletedTaskRec
Sealed interface representing exportable task nodes for use in visitors.

Only the record variants ToDoTaskRec, InProgressTaskRec, and CompletedTaskRec are permitted implementations.
